class_notes: (Seniors and Juniors ONLY) (Prior completion of PSYC 110, or 111, or AP/IB credit in psychology AND QTM 100, and 1 course in either Survey Area I or Survey Area II.  Students who enroll in this class without the required pre-requisites will be removed administratively)
course_description: Selected contemporary problems in memory, language, learning, and thinking.
